content.prompt: Which of the following implicit attitudes may have influenced how the participants rated each item?

choices.label: A participant being aware that they need one item more than the other
A participant seeing the cost of each item and knowing that one is more expensive than the other
A participant attributing a greater value to one item over the other without knowing why
A participant seeing that the toaster is their favorite color

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
